user_question: What is the time complexity of the quicksort algorithm?

steps.content: What is the time complexity of the quicksort algorithm?
<think> The time complexity of the quicksort algorithm is O(n log n) on average, where n is the number of items being sorted.</think>
The answer is O(n log n).
